scripts.build:github: cp next.config.github.js next.config.js && next build && next export
scripts.build:production: cp .env.production .env && cp next.config.cloudflare.js next.config.js && next build
scripts.build:development: cp .env.development .env && cp next.config.development.js next.config.js && next build
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build:github && touch out/.nojekyll && cp -r out/* .git/gh-pages/
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: npm run build:production && wrangler pages deploy out
